alert.note: Alert for Gila (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Phoenix (Central Arizona and California Desert)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued January 09 at 6:44AM MST by NWS Phoenix
info.description: ...FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 5 PM MST THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Flooding on Tonto Creek continues. * WHERE...A portion of east central Arizona, including the following county, Gila. * WHEN...Until 500 PM MST Monday. * IMPACTS...Flooding of Tonto Creek continues. Low water crossings may not be safe to pass through. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 643 AM MST, flooding is already occurring in the warned area. - A streamflow gauge on Tonto Creek, upstream from Tonto Basin, continues above action stage with a gauge height measured at 4.35 feet as of 6 AM MST. Low water crossings in Tonto Basin, including A Crossing, Bar X Crossing, and Store Crossing will be impassable while flow remains above action stage. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Tonto Basin. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
